meanings.definition: People who do not like something.
meanings.sent1: The dislikers of spicy food prefer milder flavors.
meanings.sent2: The dislikers of rainy days always carry an umbrella.
meanings.sent3: The dislikers of vegetables often hide them in their napkins.
meanings.sent4: The dislikers of horror movies avoid watching them like a haunted house.
meanings.sent5: The dislikers of exercise find every excuse to skip the gym.

meanings.definition: Those who have a negative opinion or feeling towards something.
meanings.sent1: The dislikers of change resist any new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The dislikers of public speaking get nervous in front of a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The dislikers of early mornings hit the snooze button multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The dislikers of technology feel overwhelmed by new gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The dislikers of conflict avoid arguments at all costs.
